duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Finance Manager and Finance Director in developing and implementing the annual budget, strategic plan, and monthly forecasts.
Provide reporting and analysis of monthly operating results for the Digital Technology teams and Business Transformation programs.
Track financials for the Digital Technology areas and Business Transformation projects, partnering with cost center owners and Finance team.
Create reporting, tools, and presentations for reviews with Finance Leadership.
Provide critical analytical research to support decisions on strategy and improve operations within the Digital & Technology functions.
Partner with finance and operations teams in implementing efforts stemming from recommendations.
Support Corporate and Services FP&A Leadership and Operations teams with ad hoc requests and other financial/operational projects.
Identify opportunities for process improvements and support management-sponsored projects that enable optimization.
Be a key finance partner to the Digital and Technology teams.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Business, Finance, or other related discipline with emphasis in Accounting and Finance. Fortune 500 Publicly Traded Company Experience in a highly matrix organization strongly preferred.
